title: Mobile Era 2016 Summary
brief: Mobile Era 2016 is now over. It was a great success. We are happy to share with you some facts, emotions and, of course, photos from the biggest mobile developers conference in Norway!

title: Mobile Era 2017 Announced
brief: Mobile Era Conference team is proud to announce the second annual Mobile Era 2017 which is the largest mobile related event in Nordics carefully crafted by community! The event will take place on **5-6 of October** in **Oslo**.

title: Call for Papers!
brief: Mobile Era 2017 announced! The 2th edition of the biggest conference about mobile technologies in Nordics will take on **October 5-6** in Oslo. That means that it is time [submit a talk](http://bit.ly/mobileera17-cfp).

title: Call for Papers until 21st of May!
brief: The call for papers will run until 21st of May, get your submission in before then to have the opportunity to speak at Mobile Era this year.

title: Call for Papers is over
brief: We received a lot of amazing technical talks submissions, enough to hold some Mobile Eras in a row. But we'll pick only the best for you! Hard work for program committees is ahead!

title: The first speakers have been announced!
brief: We have selected the best of the submitted talks, look through the list and see if your favorite speaker will be coming!

title: We are looking for more Lightning Talks!
brief: We are looking for additional speakers to hold lightning talks at the conference.

title: Schedule is now available
brief: You can now browse to the schedule on the site and see all the talks.

title: Lightning Talks CfP is over
brief: We have finished selecting lightning talks for this year.

title: Get Ready for Mobile Era 2017
brief: Mobile Era is just one week away! Here's what's going to happen!
